name: termix
description: Termix is a self-hosted SSH management platform that exposes terminals in the browser. It lets admins organize hosts, manage keys, and open shell sessions directly from a web interface.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize and manage SSH hosts with groups, tags, and custom connection settings

features.title: Key Management
features.description: Store and manage SSH keys securely with support for multiple keys per host

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share terminal sessions with team members for collaborative troubleshooting and pair administration

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your servers from any device with a modern, responsive web interface
